short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice for Access to Current and Historical Global Import & Export Air Cargo Data
description: **From the Description in French** \\[The following text is provided for better understanding: this is a public notice informing the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier.",
full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
**Access to Current and Historical Global Import & Export Air Cargo Data**

The Government of Canada, Transport Canada, intends to award a contract to the International Air Transport Association (IATA) for the provision of access to current and historical global import and export air cargo data.

**Background**
Transport Canada's Transportation & Economic Analysis (TEA) directorate has identified gaps in data related to air cargo trade flows in Canada and key trade partners/competitors. This includes information on origin/destination traffic, service connectivity, carrier market shares, and overall competitiveness of the Canadian air cargo sector.

**Definition of Requirements**
Transport Canada seeks a service provider to acquire air cargo data to analyze Canada's air cargo capacity, connectivity, and competitiveness.

**Service Requirements**

* Provide monthly provision of global air cargo import and export data from 2024, including origin and destination, commodity categories breakdown, freight forwarder breakdown, airline breakdown, weight breakdown, freight rates, number of shipments, and chargeable weight
* Provide historical data from 2019-2023, inclusive
* Allow extraction of data in a tabular format for analysis and integration into software like Microsoft Excel
* Enable web-based access to the data and provide technical support services on a 24/7 basis

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Pre-Identified Supplier**
Transport Canada intends to award a contract to IATA, which is the only organization with the ability to compile comprehensive import/export air freight data.

**Statement of Capabilities**
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified by March 20, 2024.

**Contact Information**

Name: Jessica Hanschell
Title: Procurement Specialist
Department: Transport Canada
Phone: (613) 324-1856
Email: [jessica.hanschell@tc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.hanschell@tc.gc.ca)

**Attachments**

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33421
